embeds.title: Slater (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Slater
An original character with stylish, badass animations. Greatsword leverages Fire Burst for Enhanced Special Attack bursts; Axe builds Bleed stacks for sustained DOT and guaranteed Crits on the Ultimate; Nunchucks is a unique tag-rotation specialist that restores Tag Points on Burst activation and boosts Tag Skill team damage.
